bill.summary:
Protecting Officers of the Law In Civilian Establishments Act of 2019 or the POLICE Act of 2019
This bill modifies federal restrictions on the possession of a firearm or dangerous weapon in a federal facility.
Specifically, it permits uniformed law enforcement officers to carry agency-issued firearms and dangerous weapons in certain publicly accessible federal facilities.
